official_name: Central Sector Scheme of Scholarships for College and University Students
offered_by: Department of Higher Education, Ministry of Education (GoI)
introduction: The Central Sector Scheme of Scholarship offers financial support to economically weaker students from general, SC, ST, and OBC categories who have secured good marks in Class 12.

academic_requirements.percentile: Above 80th percentile in Class 12 Board Examination
academic_requirements.status: Pursuing regular course from a recognized college/university
